vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.19;
son of: Shimei (H8096N);
brother of: Zichri (H2147H), Zabdi (H2067H), Elienai (H0462), Zillethai (H6769), Eliel (H0447H), Adaiah (H5718H), Beraiah (H1256) and Shimrath (H8119)
§ Jakim = "He will raise"
1) a Benjamite and descendant of Shimhi
2) a Levite priest in charge of the 12th course in the time of David
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Simí; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (b)   sacerdote; tribu de Leví; en tiempos de David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅金 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他將興起"
1) 便雅憫人示每的一位後裔 (代上 8:19)
2) 大衛王時負責第十二班祭祀服事的祭司 (代上 24:12)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
雅金 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他将兴起"
1) 便雅悯人示每的一位后裔 (代上 8:19)
2) 大卫王时负责第十二班祭祀服事的祭司 (代上 24:12)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.12
§ Jakim = "He will raise"
1) a Benjamite and descendant of Shimhi
2) a Levite priest in charge of the 12th course in the time of David
